description: A wielder of magic derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity
starting_equipment: Light crossbow and 20 bolts or simple weapon

level_1_features.name: Otherworldly Patron
level_1_features.description: Choose your patron: The Archfey, The Fiend, or The Great Old One. This grants you special abilities

level_1_features.name: Pact Magic
level_1_features.description: You know 2 cantrips and 2 spells from the warlock spell list. You regain spell slots on short or long rest
